  • Field Details

    • dice

      public DiceRoller dice
      Represents the dice roller used in the game to perform dice rolls. It provides methods for rolling the dice and resetting its state. The dice is an essential component for managing randomness and decision-making processes within the game flow.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int level, DiceRoller dice, int surrenderTimer, int hourglassTime)
      Constructs a new Game object with the specified level, dice roller, surrender timer, and hourglass time. Initializes game states, players, decks, tiles, and other necessary components required to start the game.
      Parameters:
      level - The difficulty level of the game. Specific game state initialization is performed based on this value. Valid values are 0 for InitializationPhaseStateTest and 1 for InitializationPhaseStateLev2.
      dice - The DiceRoller object used for dice rolling mechanics in the game.
      surrenderTimer - The time allowed before a surrender action is automatically triggered.
      hourglassTime - The countdown time for the hourglass, indicating the time constraint for specific game phases or actions.

  • Method Details

    • getHourglassTime

      public int getHourglassTime()
      Retrieves the time set for the hourglass in the game.
      Returns:
      the hourglass time as an integer value

    • getSurrenderTimer

      public int getSurrenderTimer()
      Retrieves the countdown duration, in seconds, until the surrender action is triggered.
      Returns:
      the surrender timer in seconds

    • getDice

      public DiceRoller getDice()
      Retrieves the DiceRoller object used in the game.
      Returns:
      the DiceRoller instance associated with the game

    • getMatchId

      public UUID getMatchId()
      Retrieves the unique identifier of the match.
      Returns:
      a UUID representing the unique identifier of the match

    • getEventBus

      public EventBus getEventBus()
      Retrieves the event bus instance associated with the game.
      Returns:
      the EventBus associated with the game

    • isCurrentCardActivated

      public boolean isCurrentCardActivated()
      Checks if the current card is activated in the game.
      Returns:
      true if the current card is activated; false otherwise.

    • setCurrentCardActivated

      public void setCurrentCardActivated(boolean currentCardActivated)
      Sets the activation state of the current card in the game.
      Parameters:
      currentCardActivated - a boolean indicating whether the current card should be activated (true) or deactivated (false)

    • isStarted

      public boolean isStarted()
      Determines if the game has started.
      Returns:
      true if the game has started, false otherwise.

    • setStarted

      public void setStarted()
      Sets the game status to started. This method updates the internal state of the game to indicate that the game has started.

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()
      Retrieves the current game level.
      Returns:
      the game level as an integer

    • setNumOfPlayers

      public void setNumOfPlayers(int numOfPlayers)
      Sets the number of players for the game.
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayers - the number of players to set for the game

    • startGame

      public void startGame() throws Exception
      Starts the game and transitions the game state to its main phase. This method is responsible for initializing the game state to begin gameplay.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an issue transitioning to the main game state

    • NextPhase

      public void NextPhase() throws Exception
      Advances the game to the next phase by transitioning the current game state to its next state and executing the main logic associated with the new state.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while transitioning to the next state or while executing the main logic of the new state.

    • setGameState

      public void setGameState(GameState gameState)
      Sets the current state of the game.
      Parameters:
      gameState - the new GameState to be set for the game

    • getPlayers

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayers()
      Returns a list of players participating in the game.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing Player objects representing the players in the game.

    • setEventDeck

      public void setEventDeck(Deck eventDeck)
      Sets the event deck for the game.
      Parameters:
      eventDeck - the deck to be set as the event deck

    • getEventDeck

      public Deck getEventDeck()
      Retrieves the current event deck being used in the game.
      Returns:
      the event deck, which contains event-specific cards for the game.

    • getNumOfPlayers

      public int getNumOfPlayers()
      Retrieves the number of players currently in the game.
      Returns:
      the number of players.

    • getGameState

      public GameState getGameState() throws RuntimeException
      Retrieves the current state of the game.
      Returns:
      the current GameState of the game
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the game state retrieval fails

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player player)
      Adds a player to the game if the maximum number of players has not been reached.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player object to be added to the game

    • getOriginalDeck

      public Deck getOriginalDeck()
      Retrieves the original deck of cards associated with the game. This deck represents the initialized state of the cards before any modifications (such as shuffling, drawing, or removing cards) during the gameplay.
      Returns:
      the original Deck object containing the initial list of cards.

    • getOriginalTiles

      public ArrayList<SpaceShipTile> getOriginalTiles()
      Retrieves the list of original tiles for the spaceship in the game.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of SpaceShipTile objects representing the original tiles.

    • getHourglass

      public Hourglass getHourglass()
      Retrieves the hourglass associated with the game.
      Returns:
      the Hourglass timer used in the game

    • getPlayerID

      public int getPlayerID(Player p)
      Retrieves the unique identifier of the specified player.
      Parameters:
      p - the Player whose ID is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the unique identifier (ID) of the given Player

    • getGameBank

      public Bank getGameBank()
      Retrieves the game's bank instance, which manages resources such as goods and batteries.
      Returns:
      the Bank object associated with the game

    • setGameBank

      public void setGameBank(Bank bank)
      Sets the current game bank to the specified Bank instance.
      Parameters:
      bank - the Bank object to be assigned as the current game bank

    • getGameFlightBoard

      public FlightBoard getGameFlightBoard()
      Retrieves the flight board associated with the game.
      Returns:
      the current game flight board, an instance of FlightBoard

    • setGameFlightBoard

      public void setGameFlightBoard(FlightBoard gameFlightBoard)
      Sets the game flight board with the provided FlightBoard object.
      Parameters:
      gameFlightBoard - the FlightBoard object to be set as the game flight board

    • getGameTiles

      public ArrayList<SpaceShipTile> getGameTiles()
      Retrieves a list of SpaceShipTile objects that represent the game tiles.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of SpaceShipTile objects containing the game tiles.

    • setGameTiles

      public void setGameTiles(ArrayList<SpaceShipTile> gameTiles)
      Sets the game tiles for the game.
      Parameters:
      gameTiles - the list of SpaceShipTile objects to be used as the game's tiles

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer(int ID)
      Retrieves a player from the list of players based on their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - the unique identifier of the player to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      the Player object if a player with the matching ID is found in the list; null if no player with the given ID exists.

    • getPlayerIDFromName

      public int getPlayerIDFromName(String playerName)
      Retrieves the player ID corresponding to the specified player name.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player whose ID is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the ID of the player associated with the given name, or 0 if no player with the specified name is found

    • getPlayerFromNickname

      public Player getPlayerFromNickname(String nickname)
      Retrieves a Player object from the list of players based on the provided nickname.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to search for
      Returns:
      the Player object with the matching nickname, or null if no match is found

    • endGame

      public void endGame() throws Exception
      Ends the current game session by stopping the timer and notifying all registered event listeners. This method performs the following actions: 1. Stops the timer associated with the game using the stopTimer() method of the timer object. 2. Notifies all registered listeners of the game's termination using the endGame() method of the event bus.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while notifying registered listeners through the event bus.

    • getGameSSTIH

      public ArrayList<SpaceShipTile> getGameSSTIH()
      Retrieves the list of spaceship tiles currently in the player's hands.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of SpaceShipTile objects representing the spaceship tiles in the player's hands.

    • setTimer

      public void setTimer(Hourglass timer)
      Sets the game timer with the given Hourglass instance.
      Parameters:
      timer - the Hourglass instance to set as the game's timer

    • getBank

      public Bank getBank()
      Retrieves the Bank object associated with this instance.
      Returns:
      the Bank object
